content.raw: The one question I have with all of this is whether we should throw an exception if the `Element` method is called before `Load` \(rather than the current practice of throwing nullptr\).  It’s a bit more code, but if we really expect it to be an “exceptional” situation, then we should probably do that.  Thoughts?
content.html: The one question I have with all of this is whether we should throw an exception if the Element method is called before Load (rather than the current practice of throwing nullptr). It’s a bit more code, but if we really expect it to be an “exceptional” situation, then we should probably do that. Thoughts?
